Description: Book of the Dead of Astemakhbit; frame 1; coloured vignette of deceased before Osiris.
Curator's comments: Tarasenko, Mykola. 2016. Studies on the vignettes from chapter 17 of the Book of the Dead. I, The image of mś.w Bdšt in ancient Egyptian mythology (Archaeopress Egyptology 16), Oxford, p. 98.
